Control Name: 4.5.11 Client traffic can be routed to the application in the case of region/zone/network outages.
Control Statement: How is the client traffic routed to the application in the case of region outage? i.e. is traffic routed through a global load balancer such as Azure Front Door, Azure Traffic Manager or a third-party CDN.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.5 What decisions have been taken to ensure the application platform meets your reliability requirements?
control_attributes.Control: 4.5.11 Client traffic can be routed to the application in the case of region/zone/network outages.
